p: 2-bromo-6-methyl-4-(pentafluorothio)aniline ( 1c). To a solution of 2-methyl-4-(pentafluorothio)aniline (350 mg, 1.5 mmol) in DMF (15 mL), NBS (1.03 eq., 1.545 mmol) was added. The reaction mixture was stirred at RT for 2 h, quenched with water, and extracted with EtOAc (10 mL). The organic layer was dried over NaSO 4, filtered, and concentrated. The residue was purified by column chromatography on a silica gel (hexane:EtOAc = 20:1) to give the desired product 1c as a red solid (459 mg, 98%). mp 64~65 °C; 1H-NMR (500 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.71 (d, J = 2.5 Hz, 1H), 7.40 (d, J = 2.5 Hz, 1H), 4.42 (s, 2H), 2.25 (s, 3H); 13C-NMR (100 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 146.0, 144.7, 129.2, 127.9, 122.8, 107.8, 19.4; 19F-NMR (470 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 86.46 (p, 1F, J SF–SF4 = 150.3 Hz, SF), 64.90 (d, 4F, J SF4–SF = 150.2 Hz, SF 4); HRMS (EI) calcd. for C 7H 7BrF 5NS 310.9403, found 310.9409 (see Supplementary Materials).
